thread.title: Chicago’s Willis Tower to Get $500 Million Face-lift
thread.title_full: Chicago’s Willis Tower to Get $500 Million Face-lift - WSJ

author: Joe Barrett
title: Chicago’s Willis Tower to Get $500 Million Face-lift
text:
CHICAGO—Willis Tower lost its bragging rights as the tallest building in the U.S. a few years ago, but this city’s iconic skyscraper is still lifting its game.
Owners of the 1,450-foot-tall building, completed in 1973 as Sears Tower, on Wednesday unveiled plans for a $500 million makeover. The project includes enveloping its stark street-level facade in a bright glass-lined complex of shops and restaurants, including a soaring atrium...
